General.Name: Human Xtensions Ltd
General.Description: Human Xtensions Ltd. develops, manufactures, markets and sells a modular medical device for minimally invasive surgical operations. It offers HandX, a handheld electromechanical device for use in laparoscopic procedures; Fenestrated Grasper; Monopolar Hook; and Needle Holder. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Netanya, Israel.
